title: ISIS-related investigations dominate FBI
text:
By Evan Perez CNN Justice Reporter ISIS-related investigations dominate FBI Official says FBI is conducting 900 investigations of suspected homegrown violent extremists UPDATED 4:08 PM MDT Oct 23, 2015 Photos Kutluhan Cucel/Getty Images 
ISIS-related investigations constitute a majority of the 900 investigations the FBI is conducting nationwide of suspected homegrown violent extremists, a federal law enforcement official said Friday. 
A high-ranking member and spiritual leader of Al-Shabaab has pledged allegiance to ISIS, a move that further fractures the Somali-based jihadi group and spreads the reach of ISIS farther into Africa. 
The report that formerly UK-based Abdul Qadir Mumin... Alleged ISIS 'hit list' threatens Americans 
FBI Director James Comey made mention of the total number of inquiries at a meeting in Chicago on Friday morning. 
The law enforcement official said that number includes a range of people, from those suspected of possibly plotting to those simply consuming a diet of ISIS propaganda. 
Previously, Comey and other FBI officials have only said there are "hundreds" of such investigations. 
Comey told congressional hearings this week the number of Americans suspected of trying to travel to join ISIS has slowed to a trickle in recent months, though it's not clear if that's a long-term trend.
